body:
Yeah I mean, it doesn’t harm you to just leave the ship alone, it literally does not cost you anything to just ignore it 
People just want to have fun with their otp just shut up and leave if you don’t like it

I'm getting tired of people who can't just have a fun time shipping cute characters together. 
Why can't they have some fun in their life? Not only that they want to prevent other people for having fun too.
I'm getting tired seeing this imaginary relationship between idiot teacher and student, there is no relationship at all that goes along with storyline...  Other OTP is much more interesting to read
god is dead and has been for a long time
